Best???  She doesn't even show her tummy!!  What a rip-off!

This... was actually horrible. The dancer isn't particularily good, the cameraman keeps trying to focus on her tits, which constantly fall out from her costume, and her style of dancing is more of bad MTV than any traditional oriental dance. Eisch.

This isn't a belly dancer, this is a whore....
